body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jack Campbell and the customer's name is Amanda Hayes.  The conversation is about Strolid Motors (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling XYZ Solutions. My name is Jane. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, I'm having issues with my account and need some help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'd be happy to help with that. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. To verify your account, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great. Can I also have your phone number associated with the account?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the information, John. I have verified your account. How may I assist you further?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I need to update my billing address.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can help with that. Please provide me with your new billing address.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's one two three Elm Street, Springfield, any state, one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. I have updated your billing address in our system. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help, Jane.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. Thank you for your time. Have a great day!
